name: Tripple Smash!
description:
Move cards and get as many big card as possible!

Swipe (up, down, left or right) to merge cards, with 2 simple rules:
1. Card '1' can only merge with Card '2'
2. Cards bigger >= 3 merge with matching cards
===========================
1 + 2 = 3
2 + 1 = 3
3 + 3 = 6
…
48 + 48 = 96
…
===========================

Download and start the fun!
